title: The CDR Test Documentation
description: This documentation has been  created by the DSB to assist participants in the development of compliant APIs

A.CPG.001.title: Validate pagination - LinksPaginated
given: the page parameter is included in a GET request
AND the page value is a number and page-size is [1..1000,null]
when: AND the response has a status of 200

and: the nominated <page number> is returned
the "first" link has page=1
the "last" link is greater than or equal to 1
the "self" link has page=<page number>
the "prev" link has page equal to 1 or <page number> - 1
the "prev" link has page equal to "last" or <page number> + 1
"meta"/"totalPages" is greater than or equal to <page number>
"meta"/"totalRecords" is greater than or equal to <page number> * <page size>

A.CPG.002.title: Validate pagination - Invalid page size value
given: the <page-size> parameter is specified
AND the value for <page-size> is outside the range [1..1000]
OR the <page-size> is a not a positive integer

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/InvalidPageSize"

A.CPG.003.title: Validate pagination - Non-numeric <page>
given: the <page> parameter is included
AND the <page> is a not a positive integer

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CPG.004.title: Validate pagination - Max record limit exceeded
given: the <page> parameter is included
AND the <page> value is greater than the number of pages available

and: the response has a status of 422
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
the error code is "Field/InvalidPage"

A.CPG.005.title: Validate pagination - Non-numeric <page-size>
given: the <page-size> parameter is included
AND the page size parameter value is not a positive integer (number)

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CVN.001.title: Validate version - valid version number [x-v]
given: the <x-v> header is included
AND the value for the <x-v> is a positive integer
when: AND the response has a status of 200

and: <x-v> is in the response header
<x-v> is a positive integer

A.CVN.002.title: Validate version - invalid version value [x-v]
given: the version parameter is included
AND the version value is not a valid number is [-1,0,1001]

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CVN.003.title: Validate version - invalid [x-v] format
given: the version parameter is included
AND the version value is not a valid number is an alpha (e.g. "foo")

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CVN.004.title: Validate version - unsupported version without <x-min-v>
given: the <x-v>  is included in a  request header
AND <x-min-v> is NOT included
AND the request version <x-v> is not supported

and: the response has a status of 406
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/UnsupportedVersion"

A.CVN.005.title: Validate version - unsupported version with <x-min-v>
given: the <x-v>  is included in a  request header
AND  <x-min-v>  is included
AND no version between <x-v> and <x-min-v> is supported

and: the response has a status of 406
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/UnsupportedVersion"

A.CVM.001.title: Validate version - <x-min-v> is provided
given: the <x-min-v> header is included
AND the value for the <x-min-v>  is a positive integer
when: AND the response has a status of 200

and: <x-v> is in the response header
<x-v> is a positive integer

A.CVM.002.title: Validate minimum version - invalid <x-min-v> format
given: the <x-min-v> header is included
AND the <x-min-v> is a not a positive integer

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CFI.001.title: Validate FAPI Interaction ID - included in request
given: the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is included in the header of the request
AND the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is in a valid format
A.CFI.001.then: the Data Holder has returned the <x-fapi-interaction-id> from the request in the response header

A.CFI.002.title: Validate FAPI Interaction ID - not in request
given: the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is NOT included in the header of the request
A.CFI.002.then: the Data Holder has returned an <x-fapi-interaction-id> in the response header

A.CFI.003.title: Validate FAPI Interaction ID - invalid format
given: the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is included
AND the <x-fapi-interaction-id> is not in a valid format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/invalid"

A.CFA.001.title: Validate FAPI Auth date - valid format
given: the API requires authentication
when: AND the response has a status of 200

and: the <x-fapi-auth-date> is present in the request header
is in a valid format

A.CFA.002.title: Validate FAPI Auth date - missing from header
given: the API requires authentication
AND the <x-fapi-auth-date> is NOT present  in the request header

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/missing"

A.CFA.003.title: Validate FAPI Auth date - invalid format
given: the API requires authentication
AND the <x-fapi-auth-date> is in the request header
AND is NOT in a valid format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/invalid"

A.CFA.004.title: No <x-fapi-auth-date> in header (SR specific)
given: the API requires authentication
AND the call is from a DH to a SDH
when: AND the response has a status of 200
A.CFA.004.then: the <x-fapi-auth-date> is NOT present in the response header

A.CFC.001.title: Validate FAPI Customer IP Address - is present
given: the API requires authentication
when: AND the response has a status of 200

and: the <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> is present in the request header
is in a valid IPv4 or IPv6 format

A.CFC.002.title: Validate FAPI Customer IP Address - missing from header
given: the API requires authentication
AND the customer is present
AND the <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> is NOT present in the request header

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/Missing"

A.CFC.003.title: Validate FAPI Customer IP Address - invalid format
given: the API requires authentication
AND the <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> is in present the request header
AND is NEITHER in a valid IPv4 or IPv6 format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/invalid"

A.CFC.004.title: No <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> in header (SR specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
A.CFC.004.then: the <x-fapi-customer-ip-address> is NOT present in the response header

A.CCH.001.title: Validate the client headers - valid format
given: the API requires authentication
AND the call is an attended, i.e. customer present, call
when: AND the response has a status of 200

and: the <x-cds-client-headers> is present in the request header
is Base64 encoded

A.CCH.002.title: Validate the client headers - missing from header
given: the API requires authentication
AND the <x-cds-client-headers> is mandatory
AND the <x-cds-client-headers> is NOT present in the request header

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/missing"

A.CCH.003.title: Validate the client headers - invalid format
given: the <x-cds-client-headers>  present the request header
AND is Not Base64 encoded

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/Invalid"

A.CCH.004.title: No <x-cds-client-header> in header (SR specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
A.CCH.004.then: the <x-cds-client-header> is NOT present in the response header

A.CAI.001.title: CDS arrangement id - present and valid (SR specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
when: AND the response has a status of 200

and: the <x-cds-arrangement> is present in the request header

A.CAI.002.title: CDS arrangement id - missing from header (SR specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH
AND the <x-cds-arrangement> is NOT present in the request header

and: the response has a status of 400

A.CAI.003.title: CDS arrangement id - present but invalid (SR specific)
given: the call is from a DH to a SDH

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Header/Invalid"

A.COD.001.title: Validate the Oldest Date parameter - valid format
given: the <oldest-date> is included as a query parameter
AND the <oldest-date> is in a valid DateString format
when: AND the response has a status of 200
A.COD.001.then: the data is constrained by the date supplied

A.COD.002.title: Validation the Oldest Date parameter - invalid format
given: the <oldest-date> is included as a query parameter
AND the <oldest-date> is not in a DateString valid format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/invalid"

A.CND.001.title: Validate the Newest Date parameter - valid format
given: the <newest-date> is included as a query parameter
AND the <newest-date> is in a valid DateString format
when: AND the response has a status of 200

A.CND.002.title: Validation the Newest Date parameter - invalid format
given: the <newest-date> is included as a query parameter
AND the <newest-date> is not in a valid DateString format

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"

A.CBD.001.title: Validation of the POST body - malformed body
given: the request is a POST request
AND the request body is not in a valid JSON format, i.e. it is malformed

and: the response has a status of 400
the response body has ErrorListReponse object
error code is "Field/Invalid"
